1. What do you notice?
The graph shows that their are more percentages of players of color and less than 40% or less head coaches of color. There is a drastic difference between the 2 percentages and this needs to change. The Women's national Basketball Association and the National Basketball Association has the 83% of players of color which is the highest out of all shows teams. The lowest percentage of POC as coaches is 13% in the NFL.
2. What do you wonder?
I wonder why there is such a low percentage of Head coaches of color?
3. What impact does this have on you and your community?
This impacts me and my community because racism is clearly still a part of the major sports leagues. POC won't get the same opportunities as white people in regards to being head coach of teams  in the major sports leagues.
4. What's going on in this graph? Write a catchy headline that captures the graph's main idea.
The graphs is showing data regarding percentages of Player of color in Major sports leagues and Head coaches of color. A catchy headline would be "Lack of Diversity in Sports"
ace_sentences: The graph shows the percentages of players of color in major sports leagues.
The graph also shows the percentages of head coaches of color in major sports leagues.
In these leagues, the percentage of players of color is high.
In these leagues, the percentage of head coaches of color is less than 40%.
There is a drastic difference between these two percentages.
The Women's National Basketball Association has 83% players of color.
The National Basketball Association has 83% players of color.
This percentage is the highest among the leagues in the graph.
The National Football League has 13% head coaches of color.
This percentage is the lowest among the leagues in the graph.
I wonder why the percentage of head coaches of color is so low.
Racism is still part of major sports leagues.
People of color do not get the same opportunities as white people to become head coaches in major sports leagues.
The headline is: Lack of Diversity in Sports.
